name: Zeltrus
description:
Zeltrus is a fresh take on the platformer genre about Obis, a young boy who finds himself trapped in the basement of a building. Help Obis complete challenges, uncover secrets and put an end to this with only his grenades to protect him.

Players must complete levels by manipulating objects, enemies and themselves. The levels are designed with multiple approaches and endless possibilities; use the environment to your benefit.

The game consists of ramping difficulty and soul crushing levels which range from tight platforming to mind-bending puzzles. If multiple chapters and levels aren't enough, Zeltrus also contains crazy boss fights.

  • Multiple environments with unique levels.
  • Unforgiving and challenging gameplay.
  • Solve brain-wracking puzzles.
  • Collectables for perfectionists.
  • Make a drone friend.
  • Unravel the mystery of Zeltrus
